extendedInfo.description: Note: This is the key that unlocks full functionality in the free version and will not appear in the launcher (although it will appear in your system settings -> applications window). You still need to use the free version of Price Compare after purchasing/installing this app.You need to restart the free version of Price Compare after installing this key to unlock full features.See https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cryptopone.pricecompare for the free version and free featuresFull Version Features:- Track products by Volume/Unit count (ml, L, oz, gallons, oz(uk), gallons(uk))- Unit count is comparisons such as 6 units in Product A vs 4 units in Product B.- Track unlimited categories!- Track unlimited stores!- Track unlimited products!
